org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose

Class DoublyConnectedEdgeList.HalfEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose.DoublyConnectedEdgeList.HalfEdge
  • Enclosing class:
    DoublyConnectedEdgeList

    public class DoublyConnectedEdgeList.HalfEdge
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a half edge of the Doubly-Connected Edge List.
    Since:
    2.2.0
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    William Bittle
